body:
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

ABOUT ME:
You must read EVERYTHING before applying! I have just recently started these speed arts about 2 weeks ago *7/10/14* and people have called me very good for a beginner. I've never knew what I was capable of with art, and I expresed myself with these youtube banners. Now come along, and get your chance to get one! Know that I only chose 1 person WEEKLY, and will make sure to see that you have filled the application completely, along with doing it correctly.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

EXAMPLES :






════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
People To-Do List :
OPEN [Waiting]
OPEN [Waiting]
OPEN [Waiting]
OPEN [Waiting]
OPEN [Waiting]
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
HOW TO GET ONE :
1. Subscribe to http://www.youtube.com/user/Ambamore2000
2. Post the color you want the banner to be (If I see that color unsuitable, which will be 5% of the times, I will chose a color SIMILAR to that.)
3. Post your youtube link.
4. How much subscribers (1k+ is automatic, and you won't get "By: Ambamore2000" in it!)
5. Text to say in the middle.
6. How you want the banner to be: (MORE DETAIL, MORE BETTER)
7. Follow me on instagram (ambamore2000gfx). Not required, becaude not everyone has it, but for those who do, they can follow me and get a higher chance.
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
NOTES :
- You must add "#Bye" at the beginning of the app so I know you have read the entire app.
- I am not doing everyones, only for the lucky ones or those who I think should get one.
- If you do not follow the way of applying for one, then I won't add your name in the randomization list. Just a heads up! No warnings also!
════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
